ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਹਫਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been trying for the first week
They have been trying for a many a week
uha ika haphatē tōṁ bahuta kōśiśa kara rahē hana
ਉਹ ਇੱਕ ਹਫਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been trying for a many a week
They have been trying for each week
uha hara haphatē kōśiśa kara rahē hana
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਹਫਤੇ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been trying for each week
They have been leaving a good business
uha ika cagā kārōbāra chaḍa rahē hana
ਉਹ ਇੱਕ ਚੰਗਾ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਛੱਡ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been leaving a good business
They have been leaving each business
uha harēka kārōbāra nū chaḍa rahē hana
ਉਹ ਹਰੇਕ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਨੂੰ ਛੱਡ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been leaving each business
They have been calling the first mother
uha pahilī māṁ nū bulā'undē rahē hana
ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦੇ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been calling the first mother
They have been calling their many mothers
uha āpaṇī'āṁ bahuta sārī'āṁ māvāṁ nū bulā'undē rahē hana
ਉਹ ਆਪਣੀਆਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ ਮਾਵਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦੇ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been calling their many mothers
They have been calling each mother
uha hara māṁ nū bulā'undē rahē hana
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦੇ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ
They have been calling each mother
